flavorText:
"The panic is amusing, but the real fun comes when the spell passes and the villagers start looking for a scapegoat."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Panik ist amüsant, aber richtig lustig wird es erst, wenn die Wirkung nachlässt und die Dorfbewohner nach einem Sündenbock suchen." —Ludevic, Nekro-Alchemist
foreignData.name: Hysterische Blindheit
foreignData.text: Kreaturen, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, erhalten -4/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: "El pánico es entretenido, pero la verdadera diversión llega cuando el hechizo pasa y los aldeanos empiezan a buscar un chivo expiatorio." —Ludevic, necro-alquimista
foreignData.name: Ceguera histérica
foreignData.text: Las criaturas que controlan tus oponentes obtienen -4/-0 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « La panique est toujours amusante, mais la vraie plaisanterie commence une fois que le sort cesse de faire effet et que les villageois cherchent un bouc émissaire. » —Ludevic, nécro-alchimiste
foreignData.name: Aveuglement hystérique
foreignData.text: Les créatures que vos adversaires contrôlent gagnent -4/-0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "Il panico è spassoso, ma il vero divertimento è quando la magia finisce e gli abitanti del villaggio cominciano a cercare un capro espiatorio." —Ludevic, necro-alchimista
foreignData.name: Cecità Isterica
foreignData.text: Le creature controllate dai tuoi avversari prendono -4/-0 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「恐慌は面白いものだが、真に面白いのは、呪文が解けた後で、村人が誰に罪を負わせるのかを決め始めた時だ。」 ――屍錬金術師、ルーデヴィック
foreignData.name: 恐慌盲
foreignData.text: あなたの対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャーは、ターン終了時まで－４/－０の修整を受ける。

foreignData.flavorText: "이 부분도 재미있지만, 주문이 끝난 후 일어나는 마녀사냥이 훨씬 더 재미있지."—사령연금술사 루데비치
foreignData.name: 눈먼 자들의 히스테리

foreignData.flavorText: "O pânico é bem engraçado, mas a diversão começa mesmo quando a magia acaba e os aldeões começam a procurar o bode expiatório." — Ludevic, necroalquimista
foreignData.name: Cegueira Histérica
foreignData.text: As criaturas controladas por seus oponentes recebem -4/-0 até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Паника забавна, но самое смешное начинается тогда, когда наваждение проходит и селяне начинают искать козла отпущения». — Людевик, некроалхимик
foreignData.name: Истерическая Слепота
foreignData.text: Существа под контролем ваших оппонентов получают -4/-0 до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「这种惊慌已经很好玩，但真正乐趣是当咒语一个传一个，让村民开始寻找代罪羔羊的时候。」 ～死灵炼金术士卢德维
foreignData.name: 歇斯底里视盲
foreignData.text: 由对手操控的生物得-4/-0直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 「這種驚慌已經很好玩，但真正樂趣是當咒語一個傳一個，讓村民開始尋找代罪羔羊的時候。」 ～死靈鍊金術士盧德維
foreignData.name: 歇斯底里視盲
foreignData.text: 由對手操控的生物得-4/-0直到回合結束。

name: Hysterical Blindness
originalText: Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Only creatures controlled by your opponent when Hysterical Blindness resolves will get -4/-0. Creatures that enter the battlefield or that an opponent gains control of later in the turn will be unaffected.
Hysterical Blindness’s effect will continue to apply to a creature even if you (or a teammate) gains control of that creature later in the turn.

text: Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn.
